options.explain:
[Condensed Rising Winds]
The Rising Winds around you condenses and applies the following effects, depending on the number of equipped Great Current equipment (2/3/5).
- Movement Speed +6%/+9%/+15%

upgradeInfo.itemName: Rising Winds: The Calm Before the Storm

equipment.setItemName: Alpha of the Pack Hunt Set

options.explain:
Physical/Magical damage reduction +6%
Attacks cast Heavy Thunder Attack on a single enemy. (Cooldown: 3 sec.)
- Inflicts 1,500% of total Atk. Increase.
options.explainDetail:
Physical/Magical damage reduction +6%

options.explain:
[Raging Lightning Cloud]
Attacks summon a Raging Lightning Cloud that attacks up to 4 enemies and applies effects, depending on the number of equipped Thunder equipment (2/3/5).
- Raging Lightning Cloud Summon Cooldown: 7.5 sec./5 sec./3 sec.
- Inflicts 1,500%of total Atk. Increase, Neutralize Gauge -5

active.explain:
You're stronger with your companions.

[Party Play Effects]
[Power of the Pack]
Casts an aura that grants the following to party members. (Max Stacks: 1)
- All speed +10%

[Thrill of the Hunt] [Equipment-Activated Option]
Howls to intimidate enemies.
- Damage: 3,825%
- Causes Rupture on hit for 30 sec.
- Cooldown: 30 sec.
(Damage on Ruptured enemies +5/7/8% per 1/2/3 stacks)

(Buffers excluded from the [Power of the Pack]/[Thrill of the Hunt]  effects)

[Solo Play Only]
- Overall Damage +10.6%
- [Power of the Pack] effect applied
- [Thrill of the Hunt] effect not applied

(Buffers excluded from the [Power of the Pack] effect)Howls to intimidate enemies.
- Damage: 3,825%
- Causes Rupture on hit for 30 sec.
- Cooldown: 30 sec.
